    rcites

    An R package to access information from the Species+ portal via the Species+/CITES Checklist API.

    When citing please refer to the citation of the package as well as the release paper.

    Current Status

    Key features

    • sppplus_taxonconcept: retrieve a taxon concept
    • taxon_distribution: access distribution data
    • taxon_eu_legislation: access EU legislation data
    • taxon_cites_legislation: Access legislation data
    • taxon_references: access reference data

    Installation

    So far, the only version available is the development version that could be installed vias the devtools package:

    devtools::install_github("ibartomeus/rcites")
library("rcites")

    See the vignette for details on how to use the package: vignette

    Contributors

    • Main contributors: https://github.com/ibartomeus/rcites/graphs/contributors
    • Reporting issues:
      • FVFaleiro;

    Resources

    While creating this package, we greatly benefited from:

    1. taxize that helps a lot in structuring this repository/package,
    2. the httr vignette: Managing secrets, extremely helpful for packages dealing with API.

    Code of Conduct

    Please note that this project is released with a Contributor Code of Conduct. By participating in this project you agree to abide by its terms.

    Also, please read the terms and Conditions of Use of Species+ Data: https://speciesplus.net/terms-of-use.
